TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CommunicationObjectFaultedException extends System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException

Docs.summary: エラーが発生している通信オブジェクトに対して呼び出しが行われたときにスローされる例外です。

remarks.format:
## 解説 A <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException> is thrown when a call is made to a faulted communication object. <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException> is a derived class of <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException?displayProperty=fullName> and can occur in correct applications. Because typically the code that calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method reports the error condition that caused the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this exception indicates that the call failed but the most useful error information is elsewhere.
> [!NOTE] > If an object is faulted with several pending calls, only one call throws a specific exception; the others throw <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException>.
## 例
